    • ResourceCard

      public ResourceCard(Color color, Face front, Face back, int points, Integer ID, Integer x, Integer y, boolean isShowingFront, boolean usedForPositionalObjectives)
      Constructor for cards with coordinates
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the card
      front - the face of the card
      back - the face of the card
      points - the points of the card
      ID - the ID of the card
      x - the x coordinate of the card
      y - the y coordinate of the card
      isShowingFront - true if the card is showing the front face, false otherwise
      usedForPositionalObjectives - true if the card is used for positional objectives, false otherwise

      public ResourceCard clone()
      override of the clone method to create a deep copy of the card to avoid problems in serialization

      clone in class Card
      Returns:
      a deep copy of the card
